mosinstall.name: mosemailcloak
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Cloaks all emails in content from spambots using javascript

param.name: mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select how the emails will be displayed

param.name: noscript
param.label: Noscript Support
param.description: Enable noscript tag support. *Please note activating this feature will break XHTML Compliance, thus it is deactivated by default. This means that those with javascript turned off (or with older browsers) will see a message indicating that they need javascript turned on to see the email address.
